Function ```hcc``` calculates Heterosis between experimental genotypes and commercial checks. 

Example: Estimation of Standard Heterosis between maize hybrid and checks
```{r setup}
library(gpbStat)
data("hybrid")
data('check')
res = hcc(hybrid, check)
res
```
